channel.title: [317] How do i change the teleport gfx?
channel.description: ok im going to get straight to the point, i want to change the gfx of my current teleports - the current way of teleporting is the spellbook and you click on where you go and yes there is a clickingMost file.....

item.title: [317] How do i change the teleport gfx?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“prison190, post:1, topic:363965”]ok im going to get straight to the point, i want to change the gfx of my current teleports -
the current way of teleporting is the spellbook and you click on where you go and yes there is a clickingMost file…[/quote]

To change the GFX of your Telelports go to Config/MagicSpells.cfg.

Read full topic
